name: market for fibre-reinforced concrete, steel | fibre-reinforced concrete, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20201/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents 1m3 of fibre-reinforced ready-mix concrete delivered at the construction site. Average transportation distance was taken from literature. This type of fibre-reinforced concrete is used for the production of industrial floor in Brazil. It contains discrete long steel fibres acting as the reinforcement material for structural strength. This concrete has a compressive strength (fck) of 35 MPa. 

From concrete plant gate, with concrete mixer truck already loaded.

This activity ends at the construction site where the ready-mix concrete is delivered. The dataset includes the ready-mix concrete and its transportation to the construction site. Losses due to concrete returned from the construction site have been accounted in the concrete production dataset.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period was set identical to the corresponding transformation activity.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Brazilian data. Due to its characteristics, ready-mix concrete is only traded locally.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: EURO3 lorry was considered for Brazil as it corresponds to the prevailing circulating fleet (PROCONVE P5).;Reference: BRASIL. Inventário nacional de emissões atmosféricas por veículos automotores rodoviários - 2013 - Ano-base 2012. ;Reference: CNT. A fase p7 do proconve e o impacto no setor de transporte.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Transportation distances were taken from a national survey carried out by the Brazilian Portland Cement Association (ABCP) in 2013.

exchanges.description: Average transportation distance for ready-mix concrete delivery in Brazil: 24,45 km. Lorry size based on truck and mixer specifications.
